website_summaries.verdict: These nylon collars are strong and have a strip built into them to absorb sweat. They're perfect for large breed dogs.
pros: Once these sturdy collars are adjusted, they'll stay put
Available in great color choices and have separate places to hook the leash and attach tags
The included rubber disc stops the tags from clinking together
cons: Can be hard to adjust because the neoprene makes it difficult to move the strap through the buckles
Only the grey color has reflective stitching

customer_reviews.title: Leash & Collar; Great Combo
customer_reviews.text: Bought collar and leash combo and despite a rack full of different collars and leashes for my larger breed dog, this became my favorite for daily use. Collar is strong in feel and looks great. Leash doesn't twist on itself as others do, feels strong enough for heavy pulling lunges, and dog seems to prefer it over others. For added safety I did reinforce connection points with securing tape as I do with all leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Deer Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Durable collar. Great value for the price! Seller stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I ended up contacting Phydeaux about the broken tag holder and they shipped me a replacement collar within two quick emails. So knowing they will stand behind their product like that, I am updating my review from 4/5 stars to 5/5 stars! ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ORIGINAL: Really sturdy, thick collar. Has worked great. Only complaint is that the little plastic piece that holds the tags did break off after a few months, but I just looped the tags through the plastic buckle instead. Gets 4/5 stars for that and just for the color selection. I only had a few colors to choose from and I kind of had to settle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog collar ever!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many things I love about this collar. I have Aussies and Border Collies that have thick hair around their necks and these collars don't mat their hair. They fit nice and the neoprene gives them a softer more comfortable feel. The dog tag silencer really does work and my dogs tags are less scratched up. I have tried all different collars and these are my favorites. I also really like the colors. We purchased the orange, purple and blue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brand of collar and leash. I bought them for my 5 huskies and my foster husky. I also buy them for my friends that get dogs. It’s strong and durable AND the company helps rescue animals... big bonus! The first picture is of our huskies wearing their collars (hard to see with their fur) the 2nd picture is of my foster wearing his collar. You can see better pictures of the collar and leash on Facebook, Growing up husky
customer_reviews.author: rachel new

customer_reviews.title: Thick collar perfect for a large breed dog
customer_reviews.text: Thick collar perfect for a large breed dog, I like that there is a separate place for dog tags vs where you hook the leash. We have a carabiner leash and this is one of the few collars it will go through the loop
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kara

customer_reviews.title: Police Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is sturdy enough to withstand the struggles with a police dog. If it wasn't sturdy, it couldn't take the stress of a major disagreement when she thinks she wants to go right and we actually need to go left. The plastic buckle makes it easy to take off when necessary. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: AndyT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sturdy and bright collar
customer_reviews.text: I had the collar two days and it is already coming apart. It is very vibrant and reflective and was looking forward to my pup enjoying it for awhile, but the threading is coming apart on it. I figured given the price the quality would be better and it would last longer. Maybe I got one from a bad batch, not sure. 10/27/17 updated review. The guys from Phydeaux's sent me a replacement and sure enough it has been great. Very strong and no threading issues. I like the tags only ring and seperate leash ring. Great customer service and business motto. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the fit of the collar. My dog is a Border Collie with a very small neck (14"). It's very hard to find a collar to fit her that isn't extremely small and narrow. We needed a larger one to attach her Whistle tracker. The Med size works, but we have to make it as small as possible and that makes the collar doubled on most of the collar. Other than that- we love everything about it. Especially the D ring attachment. I wish all collars were made like this.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very Clever
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is a separate ring for the dog's tags. I can't count the number of times I put the leash on the little ring holding the tags. The color selection is awesome, I wanted one of each. The only minor problem is that the adjustment slips. I have the collar on my pit bull and when he pulls a lot I have to re-tighten the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Received defective
customer_reviews.text: Revision: so I was looking closer at it (was planning to re-sell it since I can't use it) and noticed a flaw. It looks like either teeth marks or factory defect on the plastic. The pink color is super bright and pretty. However, medium size way too big for my shipoo even on smallest adjustment. Please make size small. Costs too much to return.
customer_reviews.author: mayil

customer_reviews.title: FAIL.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is well trained and we always had a martingale collar for her. We decided to give a soft collar next, but... as soon as she felt there was nothing restricting her when she pulled on the leash, she thought she had full rein on her walks! I tried this collar twice on walks, and then returned it... FAIL. Not sure if its my stubborn pit or what, but as soon as i put her back on a martingale collar, she was great and back to my obedient pup!
customer_reviews.author: Erick K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my dogs. So far so good! One of them is the gray with reflective stitching, I wish the other colors had it. I also like that the inside of the collar is a soft foamy material and seems like it should be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Doggie Bling
customer_reviews.text: Great compliment to the leash I purchased from these people. My boxer really does not like having her collar taken off. She was a rescue. The way this fits I am not concerned she wants in on all the time. Happy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Phydeaux's best for your Fido!
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer gained weight and her collar became too tight. This has a maximum length of 18 inches. It's wide but my dog seems comfortable in it. She's not being choked any more. Easy to size. Not like others I've tried. Has a nice big ring for tags and leash. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Andreatta

customer_reviews.title: which is annoying, but hey she's a puppy
customer_reviews.text: Phydeaux isn't lying when they say their dog collars and leashes are strong. My puppy is 4 1/2 months old and will chew just about anything she can get her mouth on, including my hair... which is annoying, but hey she's a puppy. She has gone through 2 collars and 2 leashes. This collar, along with the Mountain Climbing Rope Dog Leash have been very successful with my young pup. We have been using them for a few weeks now and I am very happy with the outcome. I have also gotten a ton of compliments on both the collar and leash. I will continue to buy items from this brand! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: For a more masculine bigger framed dog.
customer_reviews.text: Got the matching grey leash and collar. Collar is padded, has a very big d-ring for easy clipping of the lease. Collar also has padding all the way around to keep the pooch comfortable. There is a small plastic tab for attaching the dogs license and tags.
customer_reviews.author: geoffrey s. shootman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but Broken
customer_reviews.text: While the color and the quality of the collar were spectacular, the buckle broke after about a month and a half. If the seller ever came out with another fastening method 10/10 would buy, but as is it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great collar!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 month old pup. It’s a nice looking collar. The plastic buckle works well and is easy to snap on and off. The price was right. I will buy more collars from phydeaux.
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Fun(ny)
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was just fine. Everything was as expected. I rarely write reviews but I had to with the clever email they sent me. I hope everything contained in that correspondence is true. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Vince M

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice padded collar, easy to adjust and has a little rubber disc to put between her tags so her tags don't clink together all the time! The clasp is big and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an alright collar but it's way too bulky. There are too many things going on with it and I don't feel like it would be that comfortable for a dog to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this once we saw the good quality of their leash. Very happy with the collar as well. Good stitching, layered well and easy to adjust. Best collar of it’s type I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Sturdy and well made. It was wider than we expected and our dog is between a L and M size. The L was purchased and is a bit "heavy" on our dogs's neck; however, the M would have been too tight. Our dog is a Puggle with a neck size of 26-27" It still is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Go Bears!!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy AND Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active dog and live in the salt-saturated coast of the Southeast part of the United States. For these reasons i was looking for a collar that was both well built and stylish. I found exactly what i was looking for in the Phydeaux's Dog Collar. My dog loves the collar so far and I am going to let him run into the ocean without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar! I bought 3 different colors (one for each of my dogs) and each color is great in person. They've only had them on for a week but I defiantly think they'll hold up for a long while. I like how it's padded and like the special little clip to attach the tag. Will definitely buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hagberg

customer_reviews.title: I probably could have gotten a smaller size (just made ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably could have gotten a smaller size (just made it as short as possible). I do wish there was an option to remove the ring for the leash. We use a harness and do not attach the leash to the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Four Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: Durable construction, great aesthetic, item shipped crazy-fast! Only suggestion would be to add reflective material to it for night walks!
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice well made collar, but it was much too heavy and big for my miniature schnauzer. I gave it to my daughter for her boxer pup.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on our puppy
customer_reviews.text: This is a thick durable collar, I got the yellow one for a contrast to our black lab, it helps at night a lot to see her. Plenty of room to grow into and I especially like the extra clip for her tags so the leash can be separate. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Curtain

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this collar
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this collar. I bought the bright pink color for my female vizsa in a size medium and it fits her perfectly and looks great on her, to boot! Very reasonably priced, very nice quality and durable for my very high energy / active dog!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie King

customer_reviews.title: A Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: This is second review I have done on this collar because I bought it again for a different dog. As with my first it's made well and looks good and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jeff stark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Love the color. The hot pink looks great on our black dog. Yes - I would purchase this collar again.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea T.

customer_reviews.title: and we bought this collar because we liked Phydeaux's leashes
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new collar and leash for our dog, and we bought this collar because we liked Phydeaux's leashes. The collar hits our three main desires: (1.) It is strong and well constructed. (2.) It is soft and comfortable for our dog to wear. And (3.) it absolutely does not retain any smells. Our dog runs around with it in mud, water, and dusty trails in both rain and sun shine, and it does not get that dirty or wet dog smell on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 45lb female great she looks great with it on . As far as the reflection have not seen that.
customer_reviews.author: lep

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. The only reason for the 4 star instead of 5 is that it needs to be just a little wider and heavier. It was advertised correctly and I knew what I was getting. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: OldHermit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy collar and great quality! I would definitely recommend this brand and will probably try their leashes out too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: ... really great-fitting collar - extremely durable and I really like the gray color that we ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great-fitting collar - extremely durable and I really like the gray color that we ordered. It's a little wider than the average small dog collar which is ideal as our previous (much narrower) collar would tend to get lost in the abyss of our Shiba's neck fur. Very much recommended for anyone that prefers a sturdier, yet stylish collar for a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amir O

customer_reviews.title: feels like this will last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: High quality, feels like this will last for a long time. Inside surface against dog fur is rubber which at first I though would be a problem for my long hair dog, but turns out it actually helps it turn without binding.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Teich

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and pretty. Needed to return and order a small, instead of medium, even though I initially ordered according to the measurement guide. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RJ1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these collars. (Puppy growing, not due to anything wrong with the collars.)
customer_reviews.author: kmgump

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever loves showing off for the camera, this collar worked well in her achieving her goal to look better.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick collar. Fit perfectly on my 80 pound GSD
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: If you have an outside dog get an earthtone.
customer_reviews.text: So far a great collar, it looked bright shiny and new for one day and they it was broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Don X

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect collar for my pupper. Quality is top notch. I have no fears of it breaking. My dog has been wearing it for a couple months and I have not had to re-adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collar that comes with black padding. I got it for my husky and it fits well - it took him a while to get used to it, but he doesn't mind it now.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be well made and exactly what is pictured in the listing photo. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Collar!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this collar - it's thick and durable. The stitching is tight and feels high quality. I like how it has a separate ring for the leash so it doesn't pull or damage the tag. Easy to get on and off. I ordered the light blue and looks great on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent collar. My very large dogs are hard on things, but this is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: But this collar
customer_reviews.text: These collars are made well and there vibrant in there color. Customer service for this company is excellent too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewison

customer_reviews.title: Great collar. A little stiff at first but softens ...
customer_reviews.text: Great collar. A little stiff at first but softens up nicely. Seems like it will stand up well to canine abuse. Neither of my mutts are scratching at their necks as they did with other less expensive collars they've had in the past. Not cheap but also didn't cost a fortune. In short, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan rush

customer_reviews.title: A great collar and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the inside of the collar has a little bit of padding which adds comfort to our dogs neck. The added tag holder is a bonus when you have the rabies tag, name tag and license. A great collar and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ktd

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great! We did have a minor problem with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great! We did have a minor problem with the first collar and the company took care of it almost immediately upon receiving my message. I would definately recommend the product and company.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Alsobrooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pup Mackie has yet to take it off, so I'm assuming everybody loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Francis H. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Like is says
customer_reviews.text: It is strong and soft ,Looks great and puppy is happy too! Great company love their product!
customer_reviews.author: MissCee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, high quality. Only problem is that we have two golden retrievers and one figured out how to take it off the other.
customer_reviews.author: Annoda

customer_reviews.title: Well made, strong collar for larger breeds
customer_reviews.text: Great quality collar, solidly made and like the neoprene backing. I take my dog's collar on/off a lot, and the buckle was easy to manage and looks like it will handle heavy usage, while staying securely on. It's easily adjustable, just a little big for my 35lb Blue Heeler/Boston Terrier mix breed. Gave it to a friend with a growing puppy and she loves it. Hope they come out with size Small soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy G.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and stylish
customer_reviews.text: A durable collar. Already impressed with its resilience (our dog is very active), and frankly it looks good on him. Hard to argue with style and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Ezrael Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Best collar we’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome collar! Got it with the matching leash and both are just sensational.
customer_reviews.author: Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect collar for my picky pup!
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year old German Shepherd mix can be VERY finicky about collars but this Phydeaux collar is working out great! Fits perfectly and she's clearly happy with how comfortable it is. Seems to be very durable but will gladly order again if/when a new one is needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Besser

customer_reviews.title: nice quality but the orange is not very orange disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the orange one, nice quality but the orange is not very orange disappointed in the color. Was hoping for a more brighter orange, it's more like burnt orange.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy collar. It is adjustable, secure and fits nicely on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: L Wiggle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wish it was reflective (all collars should be) but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Collar is high quality and clasps seem substantial. Seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far great collar; got the orange color & it did ...
customer_reviews.text: so far great collar; got the orange color & it did get a little dirty quickly, but most of the dirt washed off pretty easily. if the company was more active on social media, i'd tag all my pups posts with their brand :)
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fashionable collar for your favorite pup
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do I gush over pet supplies, but if you’re in the market for a strong, sturdy collar to keep your pup safe (and c’mon, fashionable...look at the colors!), this is the one for you. Doesn’t irritate their necks and even has a tag “quieter” so it won’t annoy you with the jingle. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: This is a good, solid collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid collar. It's just a bit heavier duty than my young goldendoodle, Teddy, needs right now. Recommend for a bigger, stronger, pooch. Quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: CSO

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We have bought these several times. I love that the dog's name tag is separate from the ring for the leash. The collars are sturdy and wear well. Customer services is great.
customer_reviews.author: Piggywilly

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The gift recipient loved this collar and feels it was the perfect choice for her Pit Bull puppy. Waggin' tails!
customer_reviews.author: A. N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but if you have more than one dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but if you have more than one dog they eat the connector off being plastic. I had to get ones with steel buckles.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality collar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these collars - one for my "medium" corgi and one for my "large" rescue hound. They loved the colors. This is one well-made collar - substantial. Easily adjustable. No doubt these will last as long as any dog can wear it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stangis

customer_reviews.title: Good collars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy collars that I think will last a long time. Good variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Ran a little small compared to other ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Ran a little small compared to other brands so I ordered a large for one of our babies. Again, very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: The pets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and stylish. Was a little stiff at first and was afraid it was going to be hard to break in but seems fine now. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susheila

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS COLLAR
customer_reviews.text: DOPE ASS COLLAR my yellow Labrador looks super cool with this collar ill definitely keep buying more of these, great quality and super cool box logo on the side
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Lira

customer_reviews.title: My dog looks good in vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: The selling point for me was the color. My dog looks good in vibrant colors. I am so happy with the other features as is Cocoa. What dog wouldn't love a padded collar. We haven't lost her tags because I'm not putting her leash on them because the tags don't go on the same spot. YEAH! We are loving the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of thought in this collar. Quality seems nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Coats

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy collar
customer_reviews.text: Love these collars. I just wish my dog didn't like chewing on them.
customer_reviews.author: PamelaD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great collar, so durable and strong. Perfect for our Labrador, and pricing is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: FrenchGardenHouse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collars!
customer_reviews.text: Great collar for your furbaby! It's strong material that will last a long time without tearing. Easy to clean. Theres a soft cushion on inside part too. Fits nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mitrosky

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitelybuy again! Great quality and beautiful color. My pup looks so stylish in her new collar <3
customer_reviews.author: Recommender

customer_reviews.title: My dog's happy.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bigger than I thought. But was of very good quality. My dog is very happy...
customer_reviews.author: The RR

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality! If you want me to write a review why are you making me use a certain number of words! This will be my last review of any product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony, Clarksville, TN

customer_reviews.title: Great collar, cool colors, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great collar, love that the tag is separate from the leash hook. Powder blue was a great color. Size runs a little large but is adjustable so we have room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color and durability. Matches the Mendota snap lease very well.
customer_reviews.author: jumpforchoi

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and a nice vivid color dog collar
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and a nice vivid color dog collar. Much better quality than any other I've seen. Hope it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Bought the purple and the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Bought the purple and the color is beautiful! Loved it so much I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and well built product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and well built product. Thoughtful placement of leash ring and tag ring make for less jingle! My dog 90lb American bulldog seems to be very comfortable with it on all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I love the color which is not just blue
customer_reviews.text: It is soft as stated. I love the color which is not just blue, but deep blue.
customer_reviews.author: Yasuko

customer_reviews.title: Made out of super high-quality materials and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Made out of super high-quality materials and what I was looking for. The padding on the inside of the collar is a definite bonus for our dog and makes the collar that much more comfortable! I expect this collar to last a long time as we haven't had a single complaint yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, high quality dog collar for a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: These collars are great - super high quality materials, nice bright colors. I especially like the neoprene backing, which seems like it would be more gentle on a dog's neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Pivetti

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This collar is sooooo nice and strong and durable my pit loves it and he looks very handsome in it
customer_reviews.author: Erin P. Hobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: High quality simple collar. Pup loves it, wife loves it, I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: mvh

customer_reviews.title: but it's held up great considering my pup is rough on collars
customer_reviews.text: The tag corner has come off already, but it's held up great considering my pup is rough on collars.
customer_reviews.author: kerimm85

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Medium collar is perfect for my 10 week old Neo pup.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: This a well made collar, we are pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Golf guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Good collar. Cute logo design. The orange was not as bright as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: The collar is very bright and is well made, ...
customer_reviews.text: The collar is very bright and is well made, however we have a puppy that likes to chew on the older dogs collar when they play and it didn’t with stand her chewing in it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great collar for my lab! Durable, easy to clean, just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Wonder collar. Good quality, good fit, and I love the silicone piece to quiet the dog tags!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Nice collars
customer_reviews.text: Collars appear to be well made. Like the soft inner surface. So far, very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Varun

product_meta.title: Phydeaux's Strong 'n Soft Nylon Dog Collar, 8 Colors, Small, Medium, Large Sizes,
product_meta.description:
Size:Medium| Color:Grey

The highest quality, longest lasting dog collar you'll find on Amazon. Introducing our newest and fastest selling product to date.

 

DURABLE IN STRENGTH AND TASTEFUL STYLES

Phydeaux's Dog Collar is made of the thickest, highest quality nylon you'll find in dog collars, and outfitted with the strongest buckle for strength and durability you and your dog will enjoy for years. Our classic design uses strong, nylon webbing and is guaranteed to last for years. We have also moved the D-ring to the rear for easy leash attachment. Easily add or remove dog tags with bent-head split ring. Comes with silicone tag silencer to keep dog tags quiet. 

SIMPLE, CLASSIC COLORS AND STYLING

Whether it's nap time or play time, your dog will enjoy the classic styling of this collar. 

AN UNCOMMON COMMITMENT TO QUALITY

As dedicated pet parents ourselves, we understand your desire to buy only the highest quality products for your furry friend. We don't sell throwaway, cheap products; we go to great lengths to maintain the highest manufacturing quality and consistency for our products.

HUMAN TESTED. DOG APPROVED

Designed with safety in mind and enough strength to withstand the pull of just about any hyperactive dog.

Bottom line: if you value stylish design, comfort and quality, you're going to LOVE this collar.

AVAILABLE IN (3) THREE SIZES

Small: 11" - 14" (5/8" width)

Medium: 14" - 17" (1" width)

Large: 17' - 23" (1" width)

YOUR SATISFACTION IS OUR PRIORITY

Outfit your dog with the best, with the convenience of RELIABLE Amazon FREE SHIPPING, and our 1 YEAR SATISFACTION GUARANTEE, LIFETIME WARRANTY
feature_bullets: Fully Adjustable Collars for Neck Sizes 11-14" (SM) 14-17" (MED) and 17-23" (LRG)
Highest Quality, Most Rugged Nylon and Hardware You'll Find
Neoprene Liner, for Comfortable, Sweatproof, Stinkproof Fit
SAVE 20% when you purchase a Phydeaux's Collar and One of Our Best Selling Leashes. Add Both to your Order (Enter DOG20OFF at Checkout)

1 YEAR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We stand behind our product. So if for any reason you're not completely satisfied with this Collar, we'll refund every penny (or replace it at no cost if there's a problem).
